item.title: Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for Dnevnik, 11–13 August 2025 – Seat Projections for the Parties

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for Dnevnik, 11–13 August 2025 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions

item.description:

  • Gibanje Svoboda (RE): 21.5–29.7%
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 5.5–10.5%

item.title: Opinion Poll by IJEK for Utrip Družbe, 1–7 August 2025 – Voting Intentions
item.description:

  • Gibanje Svoboda (RE): 15.8–22.7%
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 4.6–8.9%
  • Glas upokojencev (*): 0.6–2.6%
  • Stranka ZAUPANJE (*): 0.6–2.6%
  • Piratska stranka Slovenije (Greens/EFA): 0.8–3.1%
  • Resni.ca (NI): 3.7–7.8%
  • Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 21.6–29.2%

  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 0.6–2.6%
  • Zeleni Slovenije (RE): 1.5–4.4%
